translations: n.漂白剂；漂白业者；露天看台

phrs.translation: 露天看台, 漂白器, 漂洗机
看台报告, 露天看台, 文
高密度漂白器, 高浓度漂白池

sentences.translation: 我们还是买露天看台座位好了。

sentences.sentence: At just 89 pounds, Clay had his first fight — and his first win — just weeks later, according to Bleacher Report.
sentences.translation: 据“看台报告”报道，就在几周后，体重仅有89磅的克莱首战报捷。

sentences.sentence: When you are cheering for your favourite team on the bleacher, do you understand the difficulties the players have been through?
sentences.translation: 当你在看台上为你喜爱的队伍喝彩时，你知道运动员要克服多大的困难吗？
